sourcesContent:
<template>
	<button class="button" :class="{ double, triple, operation }">
		{{ label }}
	</button>
</template>

<script>
	export default {
		props: {
			label: {},
			operation: { type: Boolean },
			double: { type: Boolean },
			triple: { type: Boolean }
		}
	}
</script>

<style>
	:root {
		--bg-buton: #f0f0f0;
		--border-button: solid 1px #888;
	}

	.button {
		font-size: 1.4em;
		background-color: var(--bg-buton);
		border: none;
		border-right: var(--border-button);
		border-bottom: var(--border-button);
		outline: none;
	}

	.button:active {
		background-color: #ccc;
	}

	.button.double {
		grid-column: span 2;
	}

	.button.triple {
		grid-column: span 3;
	}
</style>
